field.description: Number of images you want to display.
field.label: Number of images
field.name: number

field.description: Photoset Id. Use this field if you have selected photoset as the type of gallery.
field.label: Photoset Id
field.name: photoset_id

field.description: Enter the term you want to search images for.
field.label: Free Search Text
field.name: text

field.default: Get you own unique Flickr API Key
Find your flickr user or group NSID at idgettr.com

field.description: Select your user id. Flickr requires your NSID eg; 44047888@N04
field.label: User ID
field.name: user_id

field.description: Select your group id. Flickr requires an NSID eg; 80044370@N00
field.label: Group ID
field.name: group_id

field.description: This option can be used to remove all javascript and css from being loaded by the microblog module. If in doubt leave this option enabled. If you are using the Zen Grid framework version2 then the scripts and css files will be loaded via the framework. If your site uses caching then the relevant files will be loaded into the body of your site.
field.label: CSS and Javascript
field.name: scripts

field.description: Display image in fancy box popup?
field.label: Open Image in FancyBox
field.name: fancybox

field.description: Do you wish to load the fancybox plugin? Set to no if it is already used by another module on the page.
field.label: Load FancyBox Script?
field.name: fancyboxScript

field.description: Set to yes for a smooth and subtle animated popup.
field.label: Easing Effect
field.name: fancyEasing

field.description: If set to yes a transparent overlay will appear above the page and under the popup box.
field.label: Use the overlay?
field.name: fancyOverlayShow

field.description: If the previous option is set to yes this value controls the transparency of the overlay. 1 is entirely opaque while 0 is no overlay colour.
field.label: Overlay Opacity
field.name: fancyOverlay

field.description: This value determines the amount of space that surrounds the image in the popup and the edge of the popup itself. Just a numerical value is required without the px
field.label: Popup Padding
field.name: fancyPadding
